title: Gopher Chat
description: This Go-based chat app integrates the OpenAI API for smart responses, enabling real-time communication with a client-server setup and multi-user support. It highlights Go’s concurrency and networking features while enhancing chats with AI-driven insights.
stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Golang, Open AI API

title: ASCII Generator
description: This tool generates ASCII art from input images, allowing users to create text-based representations of their favorite visuals. It offers a simple interface for uploading images and receiving their ASCII versions.

title: Röra
description: Röra is a user-friendly web app that provides quick access to nearby transit information for commuters. Built with a robust tech stack, it offers real-time updates through the Transit API, making travel planning seamless.
stack: React, Chakra UI, Node.js, Express.js, Knex.js, MySQL, Vercel, PlanetScale

title: Retail Calculator
description: This C program serves as a comprehensive tool for retail businesses, helping users perform essential calculations related to sales and inventory metrics. Its user-friendly menu interface simplifies the process, making it accessible for retailers of all sizes.

title: AI Onboarding
description: AI Onboarding is a cutting-edge solution designed to enhance user engagement and streamline the onboarding process. Developed in collaboration with Shopify, it integrates interactive guides and chatbot assistance to improve user experience.

title: Weather App
description: This sophisticated web utility delivers precise weather updates and forecasts for locations around the world. Built with React and the OpenWeatherMap API, it ensures accurate information while offering a sleek, user-friendly interface.
